title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of OLED TVs and LED TVs? - Quora

response.answer_text: OLED TVs Pros: Infinite contrast ratio, in simple terms, black is true black and white is true white, this is due to the self-emissive nature of pixels.Extremely thin panel, as there is no need for back-lighting.Consume relatively less power, based on what is displayed on screen.Cons: Cannot get much bright when compared to LEDsExpensive technologyBurn-in issuesLED Pros: Tried and tested technology, has been there for yearsInexpensive to buy larger screensWell suited if your room is well-lit as it can get very brightSince it can get very bright so HDR performance is good.Cons: Cannot produce true blacksPanels are thicker, even thicker if Full-array backlight is used.Which are better? If you love watching movies in dark room, then go for OLEDs for it’s true to life PQ, if your room is well-lit then go for LEDs.

OLED TVs are generally considered better than LED/LCD TVs mainly because of of the OLED panel technology , OLED screens have richer colors, true blacks, have better viewing angles and are significantly thinner than LED thereby making the entire TV very sleek and thin but its main disadvantage is that is come at a higher price than LED/LCD tvs and its not that you can't get good LCD/LED tvs , you can. so it all boils down to your personal taste, preference and budget So to summarize you can get good looking LCD/LED TVs but generally OLED tv have an advantage in terms of screen quality but they are more expensive. Some good options are the lastest OnePlus U and Y series TVs they have offer high quality LED as well as OLED options ( if you want further details let me know) Hope this was helpful
